meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ineluctable; inevitability.
meanings.sent1: The ineluctabilities of nature's cycles are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The ineluctabilities of aging are something we all must face.
meanings.sent3: The ineluctabilities of Monday mornings always seem to come too soon.
meanings.sent4: The ineluctabilities of time passing can be seen in the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The ineluctabilities of gravity keep us grounded on Earth.

meanings.definition: Something that is ineluctable; a necessity.
meanings.sent1: Facing the ineluctabilities of life requires courage and resilience.
meanings.sent2: Learning to accept the ineluctabilities of change is part of growing up.
meanings.sent3: The ineluctabilities of doing homework can sometimes feel overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: The ineluctabilities of breathing are essential for our survival.
meanings.sent5: The ineluctabilities of eating are a basic human need.
